meta.article_title: July 11, 2011 - Where to Place Your Putaways

intermediaire.probleme: Aim one way, go the other (longest diagonal and then down the line)
Use the opponent's middle as a target

exercices_complementaires.description: Concentrate on aiming at the longest diagonal, then one way and the other, and finally the opponent's middle. Make sure to practice changing direction quickly.

metriques_progression: Aim for different spots at different levels (longest diagonal, one way and the other, and the opponent's middle)
